players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I saw Bob last night, he was alive. I think the Mafioso might be Alice or Diana."
Diana: "Bob was alive last night, I saw him. The Mafioso is definitely not me."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
